entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #185: Add video conferencing support
Open Design Engine - Feature #185: Add video conferencing support
entry.content: We've had some discussion elsewhere about Big Blue Button for this purpose, and there's already a Redmine plugin for it. I have no idea of the viability of the plugin though. http://www.redmine.org/projects/redmine/wiki/PluginBBB

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #185: Add video conferencing support
entry.content: From what I have seen, my guess is the BBB plugin needs some work. It did not look like it was a very integrated plugin, more of a link to a BBB server. I would want to see user account integration at a minimum, and I haven't been able to tell if that is in the plugin.
